components.name: banner
components.headline: We are a data analytics startup
components.heading: Knowledge drives transformation
components.html: We utilize machine learning and knowledge graphs with open banking to offer KYC and credit scoring to banks, lenders and borrowers. We also participate in several research projects funded by the European Union.

components.name: imageText
components.headline: _ AI for better insights
components.heading: Gain a 360° view of your business
components.html:
Your organisation's internal data might be BIG, but still, it's not enough to meet today's data challenges. We believe it's because, it's only part of a whole.

We make it possible to integrate your internal data to external data sources and generate more knowledge, empowering you to achieve a true 360° view of your business. We leverage artificial intelligence (AI) methodologies and the cloud, to connect what matters and provide intelligent insights.

cards.headline: Pharmacovigilance
cards.heading: Accelerate the process of Signal Management and predict unknown adverse drug reactions
